question: に
sourceAnswer: at-(place,-time)/in/on/during | to-(direction,-state)/toward/into | for-(purpose) | because-of-(reason)/for/with | by/from | as-(i.e.-in-the-role-of) | per/in/for/a-(e.g.-"once-a-month") | and/in-addition-to | if/although
userExplanation:
<tag>{adverbializer}</tag>
<tag>{target}:</tag> to/towards/into | for(purpose) | because-of(reason)/for/with
<tag>{location}</tag> at/in/on | during/while | per(month)/in/for/a
<tag>{source/receiving-verbs}:</tag> by/from
<tag>{comparison-standard}</tag>: to/than
as/in-the-role-of
